channel.title: PI Ground Items
channel.description:
How can i make ground item viewable for everyone, it currently is only viewable for the player who does that.
Made this: [code]c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(objectid, x, y, height, 10);[/code] But only spawns for current player who does that so how can i make it public?
